description: Detects the deactivation and disabling of the Scheduled defragmentation task as seen by Slingshot APT group Author: Florian Roth, Bartlomiej Czyz (@bczyz1). License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Defrag Deactivation
query: (process.executable:*\\schtasks.exe AND process.command_line:(*\/delete* OR *\/change*) AND process.command_line:*\/TN* AND process.command_line:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\\Defrag\\ScheduledDefrag*)
